NK014(pha)004:0: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo'i sgrub thabs bde chen char 'bebs kyi snying po'i don bsdus bzhugs so //
NK014(pha)004:1: bla ma dang gnyis su med pa dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:2: srid zhir mi gnas shes rab chen po'i gdangs //
NK014(pha)004:3: gdul daka'i 'gro la thugs rje rab khros pa //
NK014(pha)004:4: 'jigs rung nyams brgya'i gar gyis srid pa gsum //
NK014(pha)004:5: 'jigs byed bla ma he ru ka des skyongs //
NK014(pha)004:6: mkha' spyod me ri 'bar ba'i pho brang du //
NK014(pha)004:7: khrag 'thung mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i zhal blta phyir //
NK014(pha)004:8: sngon byon rig 'dzin bye ba'i gshegs shul la //
NK014(pha)004:9: 'jug 'dod skal bzang rnams kyi don ched du //
NK014(pha)004:10: mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ba'i //
NK014(pha)004:11: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting 'dzin gyi //
NK014(pha)004:12: gsang lam rdo rje'i them skas 'di sbyin gyis //
NK014(pha)004:13: g.yel med brtson pas 'di la 'bad par 'os //
NK014(pha)004:14: de la 'dir sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo he
NK014(pha)004:15: ru ka'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs snying por
NK014(pha)004:16: dril te bsnyen pa'i las byang nyung gsal gter chen
NK014(pha)004:17: chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung las nye bar bsdus te
NK014(pha)004:18: bkod pa la / sgrub pa po 'di nyid dkyil
NK014(pha)004:19: 'khor du zhugs shing phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob
NK014(pha)004:20: bkod pa la / pa / rtsa ba dang yan
NK014(pha)004:21: lag gi dam tshig la yang dag par gnas pa
NK014(pha)004:22: bkod pa la / pa / / sgrub 'bras gnas skabs su rig 'dzin bzhi dang /
NK014(pha)004:23: mthar thug mi slob pa'i zung 'jug he ru ka'i
NK014(pha)004:24: go 'phang don du gnyer ba rnams kyis sgrub pa'i
NK014(pha)004:29: dang po bya ba'i sngon 'gro ni /
NK014(pha)004:30: dur khrod dang ri bo dben pa la sogs pa
NK014(pha)004:31: bsam gtan dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas khang mdzes
NK014(pha)004:32: par brgyan / rten dang phyi nang gi mchod gtor
NK014(pha)004:33: la sogs mkho ba'i yo byad rnams tshogs par bshams
NK014(pha)004:34: par brgyan / nas / bde ba'i stan la 'dug go //
NK014(pha)004:35: gnyis pa rgyud sbyang ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:36: rang gi snying ga'i h'u gi 'od zer gyis rang
NK014(pha)004:37: bzhin gyi gnas nas bla ma dang gnyis su med
NK014(pha)004:38: pa'i dpal he ru ka la phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i
NK014(pha)004:39: skyabs yul ma tshang ba med pas bskor ba thams
NK014(pha)004:40: cad mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs sad
NK014(pha)004:41: par byas la / bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK014(pha)004:42: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK014(pha)004:43: zhes lan gsum la sogs pas rgyud dag par byas la /
NK014(pha)004:44: tshogs zhing rnams rang la bsdus te gnas lugs spros
NK014(pha)004:45: bral stong pa nyid kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag
NK014(pha)004:46: par bya'o // gsum pa mtshams bcad pa la /
NK014(pha)004:51: 'di ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pas bsdus pa mtshan
NK014(pha)004:52: ma'i dmigs yul thams cad stong zhing bdag med pa
NK014(pha)004:53: nam mkha' lta bur bsgoms pas tha mal gyi bden
NK014(pha)004:55: 'dir khro bo 'chol ba'i mtshams gcod gleng gzhi ltar 'byor bar snang gsungs pa bzhin 'jug bde bas /
NK014(pha)004:56: stong pa'i ngang las badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru
NK014(pha)004:57: ka zhes brjod pas bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje
NK014(pha)004:58: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo
NK014(pha)004:59: rje dang dung khrag 'dzin pa yum kro d+h+ai shwa
NK014(pha)004:60: ri ma dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i skur gyur /
NK014(pha)004:61: phata phata badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la man+da la /
NK014(pha)004:63: zhes brjod pas thugs ka'i h'u las khro bo'i sprin spros pas gdug pa can thams cad tshar bcad /
NK014(pha)004:64: tshur 'dus pa las steng 'og phyogs mtshams bcur nyi ma la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong bcu'i snying gar /
NK014(pha)004:65: badz+ra kro d+ha k+ai la ya phata dzah zhes phur
NK014(pha)004:66: bu'i tshul du btab pa rnams khro bo bcur gyur
NK014(pha)004:67: pa ni / h'u k+aa ra badz+ra ma h+aa kro d+ha h'u h'u phata /
NK014(pha)004:78: ma h+aa ba la rnams bcug ste /
NK014(pha)004:79: zhes brjod pa'i rkyen gyis rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:84: lho nub tu mi g.yo ba /
NK014(pha)004:88: byang shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal /
NK014(pha)004:89: 'og tu stobs po che rnams sku stod khro bo
NK014(pha)004:90: la smad phur bu 'bar bas bgegs la gzir ba
NK014(pha)004:91: / de rnams las sprul pa yang sprul mtshon cha
NK014(pha)004:92: sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'od zer rnon po 'khrug
NK014(pha)004:93: cing 'bar ba srung ba'i 'khor los phyogs kun gtams
NK014(pha)004:94: te cis kyang mi shigs par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:96: badz+ra sa m+aa dzah bla ma rig 'dzin zhi khro
NK014(pha)004:97: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa mngon sum
NK014(pha)004:99: sems can thams cad kyi don du mchog gi byang
NK014(pha)004:100: chub tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon du bya snyam pa'i
NK014(pha)004:101: dran pas / tshe rabs thog med nas bsags pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnams la gnong zhing 'gyod /
NK014(pha)004:102: phyin chad srog la babs kyang mi bgyid /
NK014(pha)004:103: sngar byas kyi gnyen po rnal 'byor gyi rim pa la 'jug par bagyi'o snyam pa'i sems brtan pos /
NK014(pha)004:107: ye nas mnyam nyid chos skur dag pa las //
NK014(pha)004:108: ma rig dbang gis sgro dang skur btab ste //
NK014(pha)004:109: bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin //
NK014(pha)004:110: de ldog don phyir rgyal ba'i dam nos te //
NK014(pha)004:111: bdag cag ma rig lus dang ngag sems kyis //
NK014(pha)004:112: bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur pas //
NK014(pha)004:113: rgyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK014(pha)004:114: thugs rje che mnga' khyod la bzod par gsol //
NK014(pha)004:115: zhes brjod pas sdig sgrib dag par bsam /
NK014(pha)004:116: lnga pa dam bca' ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:117: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya dang lhag bsam brtan pos /
NK014(pha)004:121: kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yi //
NK014(pha)004:122: byang chub mchog tu bdag gis sems bskyed de //
NK014(pha)004:123: kun rdzob dang ni don dam byang chub sems //
NK014(pha)004:124: deng nas tshul bzhin yongs su bzung bar bgyi //
NK014(pha)004:126: drug pa byin dbab pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:127: ye shes kyi 'khor lo thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad par byas la /
NK014(pha)004:128: h'u a la la hoh b+ha ga w+aan sa ma ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:129: 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:130: khyad par bstan pa'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:131: mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:132: byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:133: dbang mchog bskur ba'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:134: dngos grub stsol pa'i dus la bab //
NK014(pha)004:136: byin chen byin phob bcom ldan 'das //
NK014(pha)004:137: dbang chen dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das //
NK014(pha)004:138: dngos grub mchog stsol bcom ldan 'das //
NK014(pha)004:139: bdag cag las 'bras mchis par mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:140: rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra sbir zhing /
NK014(pha)004:141: h'u h'u h'u h'u gis bsdus pas /
NK014(pha)004:142: nam mkha' gang ba'i lha tshogs thams cad bdag gnas
NK014(pha)004:143: yo byad rnams la thim ste sku gsung thugs mi
NK014(pha)004:144: zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los byin gyis brlabs par
NK014(pha)004:145: bsam / bdun pa mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:147: ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai sarba dra byam bi shwa d+ha ni h'u phata kyis bsang /
NK014(pha)004:148: ma h+aa sh+au nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham gis sbyang /
NK014(pha)004:149: stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid he ru kar gsal ba'i thugs ka'i h'u las /
NK014(pha)004:156: nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab /
NK014(pha)004:158: 'khor 'das kyi rtsi bcud thams cad bsdus nas mchod rdzas rnams la thim par gyur /
NK014(pha)004:159: na mahs man+ta bud+d+h+aa n+aam ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)004:160: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK014(pha)004:163: bde mchog sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po'i rol pa las /
NK014(pha)004:164: rdo rje zhabs bsil ma la sogs pa mchod pa'i
NK014(pha)004:165: lha mo khrus gzhong dang spos khang man+d+ha ra'i me
NK014(pha)004:166: tog la sogs pa thogs pas nam mkha' gang ba
NK014(pha)004:167: rnams su gyur par bsam la byin gyis brlab /
NK014(pha)004:170: stong pa'i ngang las bdud rtsi'i snod du dam rdzas
NK014(pha)004:171: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rigs lnga yab yum gyi
NK014(pha)004:172: sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams 'od du zhu nas
NK014(pha)004:173: yongs su gyur pa las rigs lnga yab yum gyi
NK014(pha)004:174: skur gyur te de rnams rjes chags kyi sbyor bas
NK014(pha)004:175: zhu ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK014(pha)004:177: gyis mtshan pa'i kha gcod rdo rje rgya gram gyi
NK014(pha)004:178: lte ba dang rwa rnams su rta mgrin yum bzhi
NK014(pha)004:179: dang bcas pa gsal bar gyur /
NK014(pha)004:180: gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor 'das kyi bdud rtsi bkug /
NK014(pha)004:181: dam tshig gi bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par
NK014(pha)004:182: gyur pa las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho
NK014(pha)004:183: chen por gyur par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:184: g.yon pa'i mtheb srin gyi rdo rjes bdud rtsir reg la /
NK014(pha)004:185: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aah zhes bzlas shing g.yon skor du dkrugs te /
NK014(pha)004:186: h'u h'u h'u h'u zhes brjod pas /
NK014(pha)004:187: yum bzhi bdud rtsi la thim par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:189: stong pa'i ngang las gtor gzhong pad+ma'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du /
NK014(pha)004:190: gtor rdzas 'dod yon gyi rnam pa ma tshang ba med pa la gyis mtshan par gyur /
NK014(pha)004:191: ba ling+ta te dz+wa ba ling+ta ba la ba d+ya gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)004:193: gzugs rdo rje ma sogs lha mo nam mkha' gang
NK014(pha)004:194: bas 'dod yon dpag tu med par spro ba'i bdag
NK014(pha)004:195: nyid du gyur / rak+ta bsang sbyangs /
NK014(pha)004:196: stong pa'i ngang las dmar gyi dung chen yangs shing
NK014(pha)004:197: rgya che ba'i nang du rak+ta la ra yig dmar
NK014(pha)004:199: ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+da la h'u h+r+aihth+aah chags
NK014(pha)004:200: med rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrugs pas nam mkha'
NK014(pha)004:202: shin tu bsdu na sngags rnams lan gsum gsum brjod pas kyang 'grub bo //
NK014(pha)004:204: khyar par gyi sbyor ba dgos ched kyi sgo nas sems bskyed pa dang /
NK014(pha)004:205: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dngos gnyis /
NK014(pha)004:207: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdug pa can gyi
NK014(pha)004:208: yul la thugs rje chen pos cher khros nas 'dul
NK014(pha)004:210: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa'i 'gro ba rnams la
NK014(pha)004:211: rjes su chags pa'i snying rje chen po rdo rje
NK014(pha)004:212: khro bo'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi
NK014(pha)004:213: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du ldang bar bagyi'o snyam pas
NK014(pha)004:214: / 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing //
NK014(pha)004:215: gdug pa srid gsum 'dul ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:216: nga rgyal chen po brtan pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)004:218: zhes pas dam bca' zhing sems bskyed do //
NK014(pha)004:219: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dngos la /
NK014(pha)004:220: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis khog dbub pa /
NK014(pha)004:221: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa /
NK014(pha)004:222: las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gsum /
NK014(pha)004:225: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK014(pha)004:226: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK014(pha)004:227: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
NK014(pha)004:228: skyes pa nyid na skye ba med //
NK014(pha)004:229: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad dmigs med spros
NK014(pha)004:230: pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'o
NK014(pha)004:232: e ma'o kun tu bzang po ni //
NK014(pha)004:233: bde chen spros bral thig le las //
NK014(pha)004:234: stong pa nyid du rab gsal ba'i //
NK014(pha)004:235: snying rje'i yul ni bsgom par bya //
NK014(pha)004:236: de bzhin nyid ma rtogs pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK014(pha)004:237: sems can rnams la 'dzin med sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK014(pha)004:238: snying rjes mkha' khyab kun tu snang bar bsgom pa'o
NK014(pha)004:240: nges pa las ni rdo rje che //
NK014(pha)004:241: de las dpal chen he ru ka /
NK014(pha)004:242: 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu yi //
NK014(pha)004:243: 'jigs pa yi ni dus ltar drag /
NK014(pha)004:245: rang rig snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin h'u yig mthing ga gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur /
NK014(pha)004:247: de las 'od zer h'u gi rnam pa nam mkha' gang bar 'phros /
NK014(pha)004:250: mkha' khyab kyi h'u rnams gzhi'i h'u la thim /
NK014(pha)004:251: de 'od du zhu ba las badz+ra h'u zhes brjod pas /
NK014(pha)004:252: rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu par gyur /
NK014(pha)004:258: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u phata /
NK014(pha)004:260: rgyu'i he ru ka sku mdog smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba /
NK014(pha)004:261: rdo rje dang dung khrag 'dzin pa 'bar ba'i gar dgu dang ldan par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:263: rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
NK014(pha)004:264: brten pa lha bsgom pa gnyis kyi /
NK014(pha)004:266: dang po gzhi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:267: rgyu'i he ru ka'i h'u las /
NK014(pha)004:268: e yam ra sum kem ram rnams chad /
NK014(pha)004:271: 'phros 'dus 'od du zhu ba las rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:272: e las nam mkha' chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum 'byams klas pa'i dbyings su /
NK014(pha)004:273: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ljang gu rgya gram g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
NK014(pha)004:274: ra las rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dmar po zlum po rba rlabs 'khrugs pa /
NK014(pha)004:275: sum las zhing chen gyi sa gzhi smug nag gru bzhi pa /
NK014(pha)004:276: kem las keng rus kyi ri rab sngo skya gru bzhi bang rim bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK014(pha)004:277: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar nag nam mkha'i mtha' klas par 'bar bar bsam la /
NK014(pha)004:278: dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa //
NK014(pha)004:279: khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil //
NK014(pha)004:280: keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi //
NK014(pha)004:281: steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
NK014(pha)004:283: de dag kyang phyi ltar na 'byung ba lnga /
NK014(pha)004:284: nang ltar na ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:285: gsang ba ltar na yum lnga'i mkha' rnam par dag pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:286: gnyis pa rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dngos ni /
NK014(pha)004:287: ri rab kyi steng du rgyu'i h'u las b+h+r+aum smug nag chad /
NK014(pha)004:290: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+da la /
NK014(pha)004:291: ye shes rin po che'i b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
NK014(pha)004:292: phyi nang nyis rim 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis dang
NK014(pha)004:293: ldan pa'i phyi ma'i rtsig pa rim pa lnga dang
NK014(pha)004:294: nang rtsig pa rim pa gsum pa ste /
NK014(pha)004:295: gnyis ka'ang thod pa skam rnying rlon gsum khrag zhag
NK014(pha)004:296: gi 'dam gyis brtsigs shing gnam lcags urmo'i gzer gyis
NK014(pha)004:297: gtams pa sogs dur khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang
NK014(pha)004:298: gi mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa dwangs shing sgrib
NK014(pha)004:299: pa med par kun tu gsal ba /
NK014(pha)004:300: gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i lte
NK014(pha)004:301: ba la rdzogs pa'i phyi rol srung ba'i khor yug
NK014(pha)004:302: gi nang du ru dra longs spyod dang bcas pa
NK014(pha)004:303: dbyings su bsgral ba'i dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi
NK014(pha)004:304: bkod pa 'jigs su rung bas phyogs thams cad yongs
NK014(pha)004:306: ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK014(pha)004:307: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:308: phyi dang nang med kun tu nang //
NK014(pha)004:310: gru chad bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
NK014(pha)004:311: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan //
NK014(pha)004:312: 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes //
NK014(pha)004:313: thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid //
NK014(pha)004:316: gsum pa gdan bskyed pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:317: gzhal yas khang gi dbus kyi lte ba dang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la /
NK014(pha)004:318: sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa re re /
NK014(pha)004:320: dbus su lha chen po dbang phyug dang drag po /
NK014(pha)004:324: byang du gdon sbyin rnams rang rang gi chung ma
NK014(pha)004:325: dang bcas pa'i pho rnams kha sbub dang mo rnams
NK014(pha)004:326: gan rkyal byi chings su bsnol ba /
NK014(pha)004:332: byang du stag rnams zung re res pho rnams kyi sog phrag dang /
NK014(pha)004:333: mo rnams kyi nu phrag nas nan tur du bardzisa pa /
NK014(pha)004:336: khyams nang ma'i phyogs mtshams brgyad /
NK014(pha)004:337: sgo bzhi rnams su nyi ma la gnas pa'i zhing gi gdan re re /
NK014(pha)004:338: khyams phyi ma'i phyogs rer drug drug dang /
NK014(pha)004:339: sgo bzhi rnams su zhing skam po'i gdan rkyang pa re re /
NK014(pha)004:340: khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /
NK014(pha)004:341: gtum pa dom gyis spar bas ni //
NK014(pha)004:342: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung //
NK014(pha)004:344: gnyis pa brten pa lha bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK014(pha)004:345: he ru kar bskyed nas snyoms 'jug bya ba dang /
NK014(pha)004:346: ngo mtshar sras kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba'o //
NK014(pha)004:348: nam mkhar gnas pa'i rgyu'i he ru ka dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs pa las /
NK014(pha)004:349: de nyid dpal chen po sku mdog smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba /
NK014(pha)004:350: dbu dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin par gyur te /
NK014(pha)004:351: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas khro mo dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyungs te /
NK014(pha)004:352: hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis yab la btud cing /
NK014(pha)004:353: pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i dgyes pas rol par bsam /
NK014(pha)004:354: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK014(pha)004:355: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /
NK014(pha)004:356: khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)004:357: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni //
NK014(pha)004:358: khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyungs te //
NK014(pha)004:359: hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis //
NK014(pha)004:360: rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de //
NK014(pha)004:361: gnyis med 'khril bas dgyes par thim //
NK014(pha)004:364: sngags kyi sprul pa spro ba /
NK014(pha)004:368: h'u h'u h'u bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la man+da la phata phata phata /
NK014(pha)004:369: ha la ha la ha la h'u /
NK014(pha)004:370: zhes brjod pas yab yum gnyis kyi sbyor mtshams nas
NK014(pha)004:371: byang chub sems kyi sprin las 'jig rten drug gi
NK014(pha)004:372: phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa khyab par /
NK014(pha)004:373: khro bo 'chol ba mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa dpag tu med pa spros /
NK014(pha)004:374: ltas chen po bco lngas gdug pa can gyi tshogs thams cad tshar bcad par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:376: yan lag gi lha bsgom pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:378: mkha' khyab kyi khro bo'i sprin rnams slar 'dus pa las /
NK014(pha)004:379: rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo rnams rang la thim pas 'bras bu'i he ru kar gyur pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:380: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:381: badz+ra kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:382: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po badz+ra
NK014(pha)004:383: he ru ka sku mdog mthing nag char sprin ltar
NK014(pha)004:384: gnag cing / nyi ma bye ba'i gzi byin 'bar ba /
NK014(pha)004:385: dbu gsum gyi g.yas zhal dkar la bzhad pa /
NK014(pha)004:386: g.yo zhal dmar la gshe ba /
NK014(pha)004:387: dbus zhal mthing nag drag por khros pa'i nyams can /
NK014(pha)004:388: zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa /
NK014(pha)004:389: rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK014(pha)004:390: glog ltar 'khyug pa'i ljags 'dril zhing rdo rje'i gad mos sa gsum g.yo ba /
NK014(pha)004:391: khro gnyer bsdus pa'i shangs nas mi bzad pa'i h'u sgra 'byin pa /
NK014(pha)004:392: rdzi smin sma ra las 'bar ba'i me 'khyog por spro ba /
NK014(pha)004:393: sku che zhing yan lag rags pa /
NK014(pha)004:394: lang tsho rgyas pa'i 'gyur bag can /
NK014(pha)004:395: rdo rje'i ba spus gtams pa /
NK014(pha)004:396: sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa /
NK014(pha)004:397: rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs su rung /
NK014(pha)004:398: snying rje rngams dang zhi ba ste /
NK014(pha)004:399: gar gyi nyams dgus rab tu rgyas pa /
NK014(pha)004:400: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse
NK014(pha)004:401: dgu dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud pa
NK014(pha)004:402: / gnyis pas rdo rje rtse lnga dang /
NK014(pha)004:403: b+hany+dza dmar gyis gang ba thogs pa /
NK014(pha)004:404: gsum pas zhing gi dbyug pa dang stong gi 'jig rten 'degs pa /
NK014(pha)004:406: g.yon bskum pa'i gyad chen po'i stabs kyis rang gi stan la rol pa /
NK014(pha)004:407: dbu re re la thod pa skam po lnga lnga rigs lnga'i cod pan can gyis dbu brgyan pa /
NK014(pha)004:408: khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo lnga bcu'i do shal dang /
NK014(pha)004:409: thod pa tshal bu'i dpung rgyan can /
NK014(pha)004:410: zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi dang /
NK014(pha)004:411: glang po che'i ko ba rlon pas stod g.yogs shing /
NK014(pha)004:412: stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs grol ba /
NK014(pha)004:413: klu rgyal rigs dkar pos skra chings /
NK014(pha)004:414: rje rigs ser pos snyan cha /
NK014(pha)004:415: bram ze'i rigs dmar pos se mo do dang mgul chu /
NK014(pha)004:416: dmangs rigs ljang gus ska rags dang do shal /
NK014(pha)004:417: gdol pa nag pos phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu ste /
NK014(pha)004:418: thams cad kyang gdug pa sbrul gyi rnam pa can /
NK014(pha)004:419: dpral bar thal chen gyi tshom bu /
NK014(pha)004:420: smin mtshams su rak+ta'i thig le /
NK014(pha)004:421: mgrin par zhag gi zo ris kyis mtshan pa ste dur khrod rol pa'i chas brgyad dang /
NK014(pha)004:422: dpal gyi chas bcu sku la rdzogs shing /
NK014(pha)004:423: snyan gong nas nyi zla'i 'od zer spro ba /
NK014(pha)004:424: yum kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma sngo skya zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum /
NK014(pha)004:425: gcer bu skra grol zhing lang tshos sgeg pa'i nyams 'gyur can /
NK014(pha)004:426: g.yas dril bu 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud cing /
NK014(pha)004:427: g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba gtso bo'i zhal du stob pa /
NK014(pha)004:428: gzig gi lpags pa'i sham thabs sogs dur khrod rol pa'i chas can /
NK014(pha)004:430: g.yas bskum pas gtso bo dang dgyes par 'khril ba /
NK014(pha)004:431: stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can /
NK014(pha)004:432: bskal pa'i me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba'i klong
NK014(pha)004:433: na khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i ngo bor
NK014(pha)004:435: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK014(pha)004:438: las kyi rigs kyi khro bo'i tshogs rnams so sor
NK014(pha)004:439: 'dus pa las rigs bzhi'i he ru kar gyur nas
NK014(pha)004:440: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhir rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs
NK014(pha)004:441: pa ni / bud+d+ha sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:442: bud+d+ha kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:444: bud+d+ha he ru ka sku dang rtsa zhal smug nag /
NK014(pha)004:445: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba'i zhal gsum /
NK014(pha)004:446: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu /
NK014(pha)004:447: gnyis pas rdo rje dang dung khrag /
NK014(pha)004:448: tha mas zhing dbyug dang tri sh+aul 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:449: yum bud+d+ha kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma smug nag dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK014(pha)004:450: rat+na sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:451: rat+na kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:452: lho'i rtsibs la rat+na he ru ka sku dang rtsa zhal ser nag /
NK014(pha)004:453: g.yas sngo g.yon dmar ba'i zhal gsum /
NK014(pha)004:454: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis rin po che dang dril bu /
NK014(pha)004:455: gnyis pas rdo rje dang dung khrag /
NK014(pha)004:456: tha mas zhing dbyug dang dgra s+t+wa 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:457: yum rat+na kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma ser mo dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK014(pha)004:458: pad+ma sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:459: pad+ma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:460: nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma he ru ka sku dang rtsa zhal dmar nag /
NK014(pha)004:461: g.yas dkar g.yon ser ba'i zhal gsum /
NK014(pha)004:462: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis pad+ma dang dril bu /
NK014(pha)004:463: gnyis pas rdo rje dang dung khrag /
NK014(pha)004:464: tha mas zhing dbyug dang rnge'u chung 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:465: yum pad+ma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma dmar mo dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK014(pha)004:466: karma sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:467: karma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:468: byang gi rtsibs la karma he ru ka sku dang rtsa zhal ljang nag /
NK014(pha)004:469: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba'i zhal gsum /
NK014(pha)004:470: phyag drug gi dang po gnyis kyis rgya gram dang dril bu /
NK014(pha)004:471: gnyis pas rdo rje dang dung khrag /
NK014(pha)004:472: tha mas zhing dbyug dang thong gshol 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:473: yum karma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma ljang mo dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK014(pha)004:474: khrag 'thung yab yum thams cad kyang gar dgu'i ros sgeg cing /
NK014(pha)004:475: rgyan dang cha lugs gtso bo dang mthun pa rang
NK014(pha)004:476: rang gi gdan la g.yas brkyang pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs
NK014(pha)004:478: rang rang gi thugs rin po che'i gur khyim lta
NK014(pha)004:479: bu'i nang du nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang 'dra
NK014(pha)004:480: ba'i ye shes sems dpa' re re /
NK014(pha)004:481: de'i thugs kar ting 'dzin sems dpa' rdo rje rtse
NK014(pha)004:482: dgu pa'i lte bar h'u yig phra mo 'bar ba
NK014(pha)004:484: de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i
NK014(pha)004:485: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dbang gi lha rigs
NK014(pha)004:486: lnga yab yum gyii rnam par badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs
NK014(pha)004:488: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK014(pha)004:490: de rnams gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad /
NK014(pha)004:491: rjes chags kyi mes zhu ba'i ye shes lnga'i chu
NK014(pha)004:492: rgyun mgo bo'i gnas lngar babs te dbang bskur bar
NK014(pha)004:493: bsam zhing / rigs lnga'i dbang rgya spyi bo'i gnas
NK014(pha)004:494: lngar 'jog cing dbang sngags rnams brjod pa ste rdo
NK014(pha)004:495: rje phyir bsdams las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba spyi
NK014(pha)004:496: bsam zhing / bor bzhag la / ma h+aa sh+au
NK014(pha)004:497: nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na phyag rgya de las mdzub mo
NK014(pha)004:498: gnyis brkyang ba dpral bar bzhag la /
NK014(pha)004:499: ma h+aa +aa dar+sha srin lag brkyang ba rna ltag g.yas par /
NK014(pha)004:500: ma h+aa sa ma t+aa mthe bong brkyang ba ltag par /
NK014(pha)004:501: ma h+aa pra t+ya bek+sha na mathe'u chung brkyang ba rna ltag g.yon par /
NK014(pha)004:502: ma h+aa krim t+y+aa nush+sh+aa na zhes rim par dbang bskur bas /
NK014(pha)004:503: nyon mongs pa lnga'i dri ma sbyangs /
NK014(pha)004:504: phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su gnas bsgyur /
NK014(pha)004:505: chu'i lhag ma spyi bor brtan pa yongs su gyur
NK014(pha)004:506: pa las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lngas dbu brgyan
NK014(pha)004:507: par bsam mo // spyi bor zla ba la gnas pa'i dkar po /
NK014(pha)004:508: mgrin par pad+ma la gnas pa'i +aahdamara po /
NK014(pha)004:509: snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'u sngon po /
NK014(pha)004:510: de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK014(pha)004:511: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i lha tshogs nam mkha' gang bar byon /
NK014(pha)004:513: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dang gnyis su med par gyur /
NK014(pha)004:514: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:515: snang mtha' dmar po pad+ma 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:516: mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis rgyas btab par bsam zhing /
NK014(pha)004:517: rdo rje'i phyag rgya spyi bor gtugs la /
NK014(pha)004:518: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra rdo rje'i phyag rgya mgrin par /
NK014(pha)004:519: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa w+aa ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya snying gar /
NK014(pha)004:520: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa tsit+ta zhes brjod
NK014(pha)004:521: cing sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum du nga rgyal
NK014(pha)004:522: bya'o // gsum pa la sras kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba dang /
NK014(pha)004:523: dbang phyug ma bskyed pa gnyis las /
NK014(pha)004:525: yab kyi gsang gnas h'u las ye shes kyi rdo
NK014(pha)004:526: rje rtse mo lnga pa'i lte bar byang chub kyi
NK014(pha)004:527: sems dkar por gnas pa'i bu gar phata kyis bkag
NK014(pha)004:528: pa / yum gyi mkha' pam las pad+ma 'dab ma
NK014(pha)004:529: brgyad pa'i lte bar nyi ma la rak+ta am dmar
NK014(pha)004:530: po gnas pa'i ge sar as mtshan par mos la
NK014(pha)004:532: sa ma ya hoh a nu r+aa go ham /
NK014(pha)004:533: a nu r+aa ga ya mi /
NK014(pha)004:534: sbyor ba'i brdas phan tshun bsnol mar bskul te /
NK014(pha)004:535: dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes phyag rgya bzhis 'khyud sdom sprad nas /
NK014(pha)004:536: h'u h'u h'u zhes rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung yab yum
NK014(pha)004:537: rnams rjes su chags pa'i sbyor bas snyoms par zhugs
NK014(pha)004:538: te / dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra ha zhes brjod pas
NK014(pha)004:539: sbyor mtshams nas byang chub kyi sems sprin khro mo
NK014(pha)004:540: brgyad kyi rnam par thon nas rigs bsdus te /
NK014(pha)004:541: 'khor lo'i grwa dang gru chad bzhir rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:543: rtsibs mchan gyi shar lhor koo r+ai ma sngon mo g.yas zhing dbyug dang g.yon b+han dmar 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:545: lho nub tu tsoo r+ai ma ser mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
NK014(pha)004:547: nub byang du pra mo ha dmar mo chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba /
NK014(pha)004:549: byang shar du bee ta l+ai nag mo g.yas rdo rje 'phyar zhing g.yon byis pa'i bam za ba /
NK014(pha)004:551: gru chad kyi shar lhor puk+ka s+ai dmar ser zhing chung gi rgyu ma 'dren pa /
NK014(pha)004:553: lho nub tu g+hasma ri ljang gu g.yas pa'i rdo rjes g.yon gyi dung dmar dkrug cing gsol ba /
NK014(pha)004:555: nub byang du sma sha n+ai mthing nag byis pa'i ro bzung nas snying za ba /
NK014(pha)004:557: byang shar du tsan+da l+ai ser skya mgo lus 'dral ba /
NK014(pha)004:558: thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa /
NK014(pha)004:560: skra ser po gyen du bardzesa pa gcer bu dur khrod rol pa'i chas can /
NK014(pha)004:561: g.yon brkyang pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:562: de nas sngar bzhin dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra he zhes brjod pas /
NK014(pha)004:563: byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin phra men brgyad kyi rnam par thon nas rigs bsdus te /
NK014(pha)004:564: gser khyams kyi phyogs mtshams brgyad du rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:566: shar du seng gdong ma ser mo phyag gnyis thugs
NK014(pha)004:567: kar gyen du bsnol bas ti ra bzung nas za
NK014(pha)004:568: ba / badz+ra b+y+aa gri mu kh+ai he /
NK014(pha)004:569: lhor stag gdong ma dmar mo phyag gnyis mthur du bsnol nas ro bzung ba /
NK014(pha)004:570: badz+ra sh+r+ai g+aa la mu kh+ai he /
NK014(pha)004:571: nub tu wa gdong ma nag mo zhing chung bzung nas lces ldag pa /
NK014(pha)004:572: badz+ra shwa na mu kh+ai he /
NK014(pha)004:573: byang du spyang gdong ma mthing nag zhing chung gi khog pa 'dral ba ste mche ba can bzhi'o //
NK014(pha)004:575: shar lhor bzhad gdong ma dmar ser g.yon zhing chung
NK014(pha)004:576: bzung ba'i rgyu ma g.yas pas drangs nas gsol ba
NK014(pha)004:578: lho nub tu kang+ka'i mgo can dmar skya bam ro'i rkang lag bzung nas phrag par 'gel ba /
NK014(pha)004:579: badz+ra k+aa ka mu kh+ai he /
NK014(pha)004:580: nub byang du bya rog gdong can nag mo g.yas ral gri dang g.yon b+han dmar 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:581: badz+ra u l+au k+aa mu kh+ai he /
NK014(pha)004:582: byang shar du 'ug gdong ma mthing nag g.yas lcags
NK014(pha)004:583: kyu dang g.yon b+han dmar 'dzin pa ste gshog pa
NK014(pha)004:584: can bzhi / thams cad kyang gcer bu rang rang
NK014(pha)004:585: khros pa'i zhal can drag mo'i rnam 'gyur dur khrod
NK014(pha)004:587: slar yang dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra phata ces brjod pas
NK014(pha)004:588: byang chub kyi sems sprin sgo skyong bzhi'i rnam par
NK014(pha)004:589: thon nas rigs bsdus te sgo bzhir rang rang gi
NK014(pha)004:591: badz+ra +aar+ya te dza te nga dzah shar sgo rta gdong ma sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:593: lho sgor phag gdong ma nag mo mche zhags 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:595: nub sgor seng gdong ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:596: badz+ra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu hoh byang sgor spyang gdong ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:597: bzhi ka'ang gcer bu gtum zhing khros pa'i nyams can dur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan te /
NK014(pha)004:600: bdag nyid badz+ra he ru kar gsal ba'i thugs ka nas /
NK014(pha)004:601: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:602: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:603: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:604: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:607: khyams phyi ma'i phyogs bzhir drug drug dang /
NK014(pha)004:608: sgo bzhir re re ste rang rang gi stan la 'khod pa las rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:615: shar stod nas g.yas bskor du rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:616: srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang ba /
NK014(pha)004:617: tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams pa /
NK014(pha)004:618: lha chen mo dkar ljang tri shul 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:619: rtog 'dod ma sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang ba /
NK014(pha)004:620: gzhon nu ma dmar mo mdung thung 'phen pa /
NK014(pha)004:621: brgya byin ma dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:628: lho stod nas rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:629: rdo rje ma ser mo dung khrag 'thung ba /
NK014(pha)004:630: bdud rtsi ma dmar mo pad+ma bsnams pa /
NK014(pha)004:631: zla ba ma dkar mo pun+da r+ai ka 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:632: be con ma ljang nag dbyug to 'phyar ba /
NK014(pha)004:633: srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung ba /
NK014(pha)004:634: za ba ma ljang nag rgyu ma 'dren pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:636: ru d+hi ra ma t+t+aa b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:637: e ka tsa ri n+ai b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:641: nub stod nas rim pa bzhin dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'phyar ba /
NK014(pha)004:642: stobs chen dkar mo gshol mda' 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:643: rdo rje ser mo spu gris gcod pa /
NK014(pha)004:644: 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
NK014(pha)004:645: nor srung ma dkar mo bum pa 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:646: rlung lha ma sngon mo ba dan 'phyar ba'o //
NK014(pha)004:647: ma h+aa m+aa ra na badz+ra b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:653: byang stod nas rim pa bzhin /
NK014(pha)004:654: gsod byed ma dkar mo ral gri 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:655: me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'phyar ba /
NK014(pha)004:656: phag mo nag mo mche zhags 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:657: rgan byed ma dmar mo zhing chung za ba /
NK014(pha)004:658: sna chen ma dkar ljang thod khrag 'thung ba /
NK014(pha)004:659: chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:660: badz+ra ma h+aa k+aa li b+h+yo /
NK014(pha)004:664: shar sgor rdo rje nag mo chen mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:665: lho sgor rdo rje mo ser nag zhags pa 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:666: nub sgor rdo rje bum sna ma dmar nag lcags sgrog 'dzin pa /
NK014(pha)004:667: byang sgor rdo rje gsus 'dzin ma ljang nag dril
NK014(pha)004:668: bu 'khrol ba ste thams cad kyang gtum zhing khros
NK014(pha)004:669: pa drag mo'i nyams can dur khrod rol pa'i chas
NK014(pha)004:670: kyis brgyan te / 'dod rgur bsgyur ba'i rnam rol
NK014(pha)004:671: cir yang 'char bas me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na
NK014(pha)004:672: gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyi srog gi gor ye
NK014(pha)004:673: shes sems dpa' dwangs ma'i srog yig dang bcas pas
NK014(pha)004:674: kyis brgyan te / mtshan pa'o // sngags tshig gis gsal gdab pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:675: h'u ha he phata b+h+yo ram /
NK014(pha)004:676: zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad gsal
NK014(pha)004:677: brtan sgrib pa med pa 'bar ba'i 'od zer mkha'
NK014(pha)004:678: khyab tu 'phro ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par bsam
NK014(pha)004:679: mo // smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang //
NK014(pha)004:680: dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku //
NK014(pha)004:681: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad //
NK014(pha)004:682: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK014(pha)004:683: rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
NK014(pha)004:684: sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zla'i chas //
NK014(pha)004:685: stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas //
NK014(pha)004:686: rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:687: ral gri dgra s+t+wa gshol la sogs //
NK014(pha)004:688: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs te //
NK014(pha)004:690: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //
NK014(pha)004:691: sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas rab mdzes shing //
NK014(pha)004:692: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK014(pha)004:693: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
NK014(pha)004:694: rang gi stan dang lag cha dang //
NK014(pha)004:695: ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
NK014(pha)004:696: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yis //
NK014(pha)004:697: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK014(pha)004:700: ting 'dzin gsum dang lha'i mngon rtogs rnams bsnyen pa'i
NK014(pha)004:701: don po che yin pas dang po pa rnams ha
NK014(pha)004:702: cang bsdus na mi dga' bas de tsam byas la
NK014(pha)004:703: / mngon rtogs ma 'dres shing goms par gyur pa
NK014(pha)004:704: na gtso bo'i mngon rtogs tsam gyi mthar bskyed sngags
NK014(pha)004:706: h'u ha he phata b+h+yo ram sogs kyis gsal gdab
NK014(pha)004:707: pa dang dbang bskur rgyas gdab rnams sngags rgya tsam
NK014(pha)004:709: gsum pa las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lnga ste /
NK014(pha)004:710: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba /
NK014(pha)004:712: bshags shing dngos grub gsol ba /
NK014(pha)004:718: rig pa'i me tog dor ba /
NK014(pha)004:719: dngos grub bskul te bstim pa'o //
NK014(pha)004:721: gtso bo'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar dwangs ma'i
NK014(pha)004:722: srog h'u mthing ga ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rtag
NK014(pha)004:724: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul bas /
NK014(pha)004:725: chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las /
NK014(pha)004:726: gzugs sku lnga bcu rtsa brgyad sgyu 'phrul yeshesa kyi
NK014(pha)004:727: 'khor lo'i rnam pa can du sad par bsam la
NK014(pha)004:729: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK014(pha)004:730: mi dmigs thugs kyii dkyil 'khor las //
NK014(pha)004:731: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
NK014(pha)004:732: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK014(pha)004:733: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK014(pha)004:734: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
NK014(pha)004:735: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
NK014(pha)004:736: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
NK014(pha)004:740: e h+ye hi +aa na ya dzahmh'u bam hoh ram
NK014(pha)004:741: zhes pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang me ri
NK014(pha)004:744: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya h'u /
NK014(pha)004:746: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK014(pha)004:747: dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin
NK014(pha)004:748: las rnams rang bzhin dbyer med du rtogs par bya'o
NK014(pha)004:750: khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa //
NK014(pha)004:751: thugs rje khro dpal rngams pa'i tshogs //
NK014(pha)004:752: 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che //
NK014(pha)004:753: de nyid du ni bdag la stsol //
NK014(pha)004:754: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:755: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phata /
NK014(pha)004:756: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoh zhes pas ye
NK014(pha)004:757: shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig pa la dbyer med
NK014(pha)004:758: du bstims nas / h+aum ha he phata /
NK014(pha)004:759: ces brjod pas brtan par byas la /
NK014(pha)004:760: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK014(pha)004:761: k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:763: gnyis pa la phyag dang mchod pa gnyis las /
NK014(pha)004:765: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las mar me
NK014(pha)004:766: gcig las gnyis chad kyi tshul du he ru ka
NK014(pha)004:767: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas thon nas dkyil
NK014(pha)004:769: sems can thams cad dang bya byed thun mong par
NK014(pha)004:770: gyur nas phyag dang mchod pa sogs las kyi rim
NK014(pha)004:772: de'i dang po phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:774: srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:775: mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:776: khros pa'i longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:777: rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:778: a ti p+au hoh pra tits+tsha hoh zhes pas phyag bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:779: gnyis pa mchod pa bcu gsum las /
NK014(pha)004:780: dang po phyag rgya'i mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:782: rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir //
NK014(pha)004:783: dbus kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni //
NK014(pha)004:784: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal //
NK014(pha)004:785: rtse dgu rtse lnga ti ra g.yas //
NK014(pha)004:786: dril bu dung dmar 'jig rten g.yon //
NK014(pha)004:787: dpal chen ye shes thabs kyi rgya //
NK014(pha)004:788: shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni //
NK014(pha)004:789: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing //
NK014(pha)004:790: g.yas pas shes rab thabs la brten //
NK014(pha)004:791: g.yon pas dung dmar gtso la stob //
NK014(pha)004:792: kro d+hi shwa r+ai dbyings kyi rgya //
NK014(pha)004:793: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas kyang //
NK014(pha)004:794: mchod bzhes dam skong dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:798: bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gtso //
NK014(pha)004:799: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis //
NK014(pha)004:800: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun //
NK014(pha)004:801: kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
NK014(pha)004:802: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu
NK014(pha)004:803: khe b+h+yah sarba that+kham ut+ga te s+pha ra na hi
NK014(pha)004:804: mam ga ga na kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)004:805: zhes pas phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon gyi dngos
NK014(pha)004:806: po mtha' dag spyod yul yongs su dag pa kun
NK014(pha)004:807: tu bzang po'i mchod sprin chen por 'bul lo //
NK014(pha)004:809: +aa ha ra +aa ha ra sarba bid+y+aa d+ha ra
NK014(pha)004:810: p+au dzi te na mahs man+ta bud+d+h+aa n+aam ga ga
NK014(pha)004:811: na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK014(pha)004:813: pa na pem pe nu su ra to /
NK014(pha)004:815: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sid+d+hi hu /
NK014(pha)004:817: sarba ma h+aa su kha sid+d+hi hu /
NK014(pha)004:818: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK014(pha)004:822: lha mo rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs mchod
NK014(pha)004:823: nas shangs la sogs pa'i dbang po so so la
NK014(pha)004:827: rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /
NK014(pha)004:828: rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman //
NK014(pha)004:829: rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos //
NK014(pha)004:830: ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas //
NK014(pha)004:831: rgyud lnga sems can can kun bsgral phyir //
NK014(pha)004:832: dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi 'di //
NK014(pha)004:833: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
NK014(pha)004:834: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi //
NK014(pha)004:835: thugs dam dbyings nas bskul ba'i phyir //
NK014(pha)004:836: 'di ni sngon gyi tha tshig ste //
NK014(pha)004:837: sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid du //
NK014(pha)004:838: bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na //
NK014(pha)004:839: bla med 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:840: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:842: dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems //
NK014(pha)004:843: de stsol bla ma de rgya lhag pa'i lha //
NK014(pha)004:844: de dbang sprul pa'i 'khor lo bcas pa la //
NK014(pha)004:845: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:846: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:847: rgyal ba chos kyi sku yi dgongs pa yis //
NK014(pha)004:848: bde gshegs rigs lnga rigs gsum mgon po dang //
NK014(pha)004:849: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i bar du byin rlabs te //
NK014(pha)004:850: 'das dang ma byon da lta dus gsum gyi //
NK014(pha)004:851: sgyu 'phrul brgyud pa'i bla ma thams cad la //
NK014(pha)004:852: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:853: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:854: gzhan yang dbang bskur rgyud bshad man ngag gi //
NK014(pha)004:855: brgyud pa'i bka' bab du ma'i chu bo kun //
NK014(pha)004:856: gcig 'dus drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma la //
NK014(pha)004:857: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:858: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:859: tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal chen he ru ka /
NK014(pha)004:860: 'bar ba'i rgyal po khro rgyal yab yum bcu //
NK014(pha)004:861: koo r+ai la sogs ma mo brgyad rnams la //
NK014(pha)004:862: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:863: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:864: sid+ha la sogs phra men mche gshog brgyad //
NK014(pha)004:865: rdo rje gdong mo sgo skyong rnam pa bzhi //
NK014(pha)004:866: ma tshogs dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad la //
NK014(pha)004:867: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:868: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:869: gzhan yang rig 'dzin dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dang //
NK014(pha)004:870: dam can chos skyong rigs drug pha ma sogs //
NK014(pha)004:871: srid gsum ka dag rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK014(pha)004:872: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK014(pha)004:873: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:874: zhes mthar dngos grub blang ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:875: rang gi lce h'u yig dang /
NK014(pha)004:876: sman gyi steng du +aahmh'u gsum bsgoms te /
NK014(pha)004:877: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya sid+d+hi /
NK014(pha)004:878: w+aa ka sid+d+hi +aah tsit+ta sid+d+hi h'u /
NK014(pha)004:879: zhes rim par brjod cing blangs nas lce la bzhag
NK014(pha)004:880: pas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam
NK014(pha)004:881: mo // drug pa gtor ma'i mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:882: dzahmh'u bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:888: ba lim ta pra t+aits+tsha hoh sh+r+ai m+aan kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:889: zhes gtor ma 'dod yon gyi phung po las 'dod
NK014(pha)004:890: yon drug gi lha mo nam mkha' gang bar 'phros
NK014(pha)004:891: / dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi dbang po drug gi
NK014(pha)004:892: gnas su thim pas dgyes pa bskyed nas rang la
NK014(pha)004:893: gnyis med du gyur par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:894: bdun pa bdud rtsi gsang bsnan gyi mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:895: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:896: zhes lha rnams kyi zhal du mu tig dkar po
NK014(pha)004:897: dri ma med pa lta bu gsol bas dgyes shing
NK014(pha)004:899: brgyad pa rak+ta'i mchod pa 'bul ba la gsum las /
NK014(pha)004:902: he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang //
NK014(pha)004:903: dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas //
NK014(pha)004:904: dpal cha na 'khor bcas spyan drangs te //
NK014(pha)004:905: dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru //
NK014(pha)004:906: zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas //
NK014(pha)004:909: ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol //
NK014(pha)004:910: dzahmh'u bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:915: sh+r+ai m+aan kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:916: zhes rak+ta'i dwangs ma ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i ngo bor sum gcig rol par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:918: dzahmh'u bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:919: sarba dush+tana sa ma ya ru dra m+aa ra ya kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:920: hrihd ya pi pa h'u phata /
NK014(pha)004:921: ces rak+ta'i khu ba zhing bcu'i dgra bgegs kyi ngo bor sum gnyis rol par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:923: dzahmh'u bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:924: sa ma ya ma h+aa m+aam sa /
NK014(pha)004:928: ma h+aa go ro tsa na /
NK014(pha)004:929: ma h+aa kem ni ri ti /
NK014(pha)004:930: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta /
NK014(pha)004:931: ma h+aa ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha hoh kha kha kha /
NK014(pha)004:936: zhes rak+ta'i rtsig ma zhing bcu'i dug gsum sha khrag
NK014(pha)004:937: rus pa'i dngos por lhag med du rol par bsam
NK014(pha)004:938: mo // dgu pa bsgral mchod ni /
NK014(pha)004:940: ram las ye shes kyi me 'bar bas sems can
NK014(pha)004:941: thams cad kyi snying nang na gnas pa'i rigs drug
NK014(pha)004:942: gi sa bon bag chags dang bcas pa bsregs /
NK014(pha)004:943: rnam shes chos kyi dbyings su bsgral bar bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:948: sa ma ya hoh a nu r+aa go hamh a nu r+aa ga ya mye /
NK014(pha)004:949: dzahmh'u bam hoh h'u h'u h'u /
NK014(pha)004:950: bo d+hi tsit+ta s+pha ra na phata /
NK014(pha)004:952: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK014(pha)004:953: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes
NK014(pha)004:954: su chags pa dang dbyer med pa'i nga rgyal bya'o
NK014(pha)004:955: // bcu gcig pa 'dod yon ro mnyam gyi mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:957: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo //
NK014(pha)004:958: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni //
NK014(pha)004:960: chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol //
NK014(pha)004:961: zhes 'dod yon gyi snang ba thams cad lha dang
NK014(pha)004:962: lha mor dag pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
NK014(pha)004:963: cad bde ba chen por ro gcig tu gyur par
NK014(pha)004:964: bsam pa ni bla na med pa'i dug gsum lam
NK014(pha)004:966: bcu gnyis pa rol mo ye shes kyi mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:977: zhes brjod la rol mo sna tshogs pa'i sgra sbir ro //
NK014(pha)004:978: bcu gsum pa glu ye shes kyi mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:980: gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK014(pha)004:982: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
NK014(pha)004:983: mche ba zangs yag za byed che //
NK014(pha)004:985: rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
NK014(pha)004:986: gtum chen ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad //
NK014(pha)004:987: a la ha la'i gad rgyangs che //
NK014(pha)004:988: spyugs pa'ii 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che //
NK014(pha)004:990: khro bo shes rab 'od po che //
NK014(pha)004:991: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal //
NK014(pha)004:993: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che //
NK014(pha)004:995: khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po //
NK014(pha)004:998: sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che //
NK014(pha)004:1000: bdud kun gyi ni bdud po che //
NK014(pha)004:1001: bdud kyi bdud de bdud 'joms pa //
NK014(pha)004:1003: 'jigs byed chen po thig le che //
NK014(pha)004:1005: rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NK014(pha)004:1006: rdo rje chu ste sdud chen po //
NK014(pha)004:1007: rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che //
NK014(pha)004:1008: rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che //
NK014(pha)004:1009: hoh zhes yon tan rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas bstod pa bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1010: shin tu bsdu na dbab drangs bstim brtan mchod pa
NK014(pha)004:1011: rnams sngags tsam dang bstod pa'ang shwa lo ka mtha'
NK014(pha)004:1017: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1018: dzahmh'u bam hoh pra t+aits+tsha hoh hoh spros pa med
NK014(pha)004:1019: pa'i dbyings rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
NK014(pha)004:1020: pa na / dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i
NK014(pha)004:1021: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
NK014(pha)004:1022: pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag dang ldan pa bcom
NK014(pha)004:1023: ldan 'das dpal chen po he ru ka la sogs
NK014(pha)004:1024: pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rigs mchog gzungs
NK014(pha)004:1025: kyi yum gyi dbyings na rnam par bzhugs pa sems
NK014(pha)004:1026: pa na / dpa'i tshogs / sems ma'i 'khor /
NK014(pha)004:1027: ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid /
NK014(pha)004:1031: ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dgongs su gsol /
NK014(pha)004:1032: bdag cag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'tshogs pa rnams
NK014(pha)004:1033: kyis dang po gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i sgor
NK014(pha)004:1034: khas 'ches te / dam tshig gnyan mo ma nor bar mnos pa las /
NK014(pha)004:1035: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag dang /
NK014(pha)004:1036: 'gal 'khrul zhig ral du gyur pa ci mchis pa
NK014(pha)004:1037: thams cad shin tu gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis
NK014(pha)004:1038: mthol zhing bshags par mchis na /
NK014(pha)004:1039: dbyings nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i ngang gis sku
NK014(pha)004:1040: bzod pa chen po dang du bzhes nas tshangs pa
NK014(pha)004:1041: mchog yid bzhin du thob par stsal du gsol /
NK014(pha)004:1042: bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i sku gsung thugs kyi bla man chad nas /
NK014(pha)004:1043: dngos grub kyi skal ba dang rigs rgyud gang lags
NK014(pha)004:1044: pa thams cad phyi mar bsdad mi 'tshal bar dus
NK014(pha)004:1045: da lta nyid du thob par stsal du gsol /
NK014(pha)004:1046: rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod par byed pa'i
NK014(pha)004:1047: phyi nang gi mi shis pa'i rkyen thams cad phrin
NK014(pha)004:1048: las rnam pa bzhis ji ltar 'dul bar 'tshams pa
NK014(pha)004:1049: bzhin mdzad nas ming tsam yang mi grags par mdzad
NK014(pha)004:1050: du gsol / bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams //
NK014(pha)004:1051: bcad gtub sdug bsngal lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur yang //
NK014(pha)004:1052: grib ma phog pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzod pas //
NK014(pha)004:1053: sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:1054: gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa'i nyi ma stong phrag gi //
NK014(pha)004:1055: 'od bzhin 'jig rten khams 'dir rtag tu 'byung ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:1056: lus ngag sems la tshe 'dir rdo rje rab snang ste //
NK014(pha)004:1057: re smon thams cad dus 'di nyid du stsal du gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1060: bde bar gshegs pa khyed ci 'dra //
NK014(pha)004:1061: de 'dra kho nar bdag gyur cig /
NK014(pha)004:1062: spyod pa rmad byung bsam yas pa //
NK014(pha)004:1063: 'gro la phan phyir bdag gis spyad //
NK014(pha)004:1064: byang chub sems mchog dam pa dang //
NK014(pha)004:1065: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya 'di //
NK014(pha)004:1066: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong na //
NK014(pha)004:1067: rdo rje rgyal pos byin rlabs mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:1069: sangs rgyas mdzad dka' bdag gis bsgrubs //
NK014(pha)004:1070: byang chub spyod dka' bdag gis spyad //
NK014(pha)004:1072: bdag cag bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK014(pha)004:1073: ces brjod de shar sgor 'khod pa'i las kyi he ru ka gtso bo'i thugs kar thim par bsam /
NK014(pha)004:1075: lha rnams kyi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar rdo
NK014(pha)004:1076: rje'i lte bar nyi ma'i gdan sran zlum tsam gyi
NK014(pha)004:1077: dbus su rigs lnga la h+aum /
NK014(pha)004:1078: koo r+ai ma brgyad la ha /
NK014(pha)004:1081: dbang phyug ma rnams la b+h+yo re rnams ru lu
NK014(pha)004:1082: 'bru brgyad pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba re res bskor
NK014(pha)004:1085: bdag gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'od zer mchod
NK014(pha)004:1086: pa'i tshul du spros pas ye shes kyi lha tshogs
NK014(pha)004:1089: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang dngos grub thams
NK014(pha)004:1090: cad 'od dang 'od zer gyi rnam pas bdag la
NK014(pha)004:1091: stsal shing thim par dmigs pa ste /
NK014(pha)004:1092: dam ye 'phro 'du'i gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa'i ngang nas skyon bcu spangs te bzla bar bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1094: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:1095: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1097: des mtshon nas rigs bzhi dang /
NK014(pha)004:1098: gnas yul gyi ma mo sgo skyong dbang phyug ma
NK014(pha)004:1099: rnams so so'i bskyed sngags la ru lu 'bru brgyad
NK014(pha)004:1100: sbyar ba gtso 'khor gyi 'gros dang sbyar nas brgya
NK014(pha)004:1101: dang nyer gcig bdun sogs rim par bzla zhing /
NK014(pha)004:1103: ru lu nyid la gtso bor bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1105: rtags dus grangs kyi phye bar rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad rdzogs kyi bar du bya bar gsungs kyang /
NK014(pha)004:1106: mos sgom nyi tshe ba las rung tsam gyi bsnyen tshad ni /
NK014(pha)004:1107: gtso bo badz+ra he ru ka la chig 'bum /
NK014(pha)004:1108: rigs bzhi'i he ru ka la chig khri re /
NK014(pha)004:1109: koo seng sgo ma dbang mo bcas la lnga stong
NK014(pha)004:1110: re gsungs pa rnams dus kyi dbang gis bzhi 'gyur
NK014(pha)004:1111: dang / spyi 'dzab kho na 'bum phrag bzhis mtha' brten pa bzla zhing /
NK014(pha)004:1112: de thams cad la 'bum rjes su khri sogs bcu cha'i grangs kyi kha skong dang /
NK014(pha)004:1113: bcu cha'i sbyin sreg dang bcas pa bya ba yin no //
NK014(pha)004:1115: spro na gzhi bstod rgyas pa gzhung ltar ram /
NK014(pha)004:1118: bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing //
NK014(pha)004:1119: byams dang snying rjes dgra zun mi mnga' yang //
NK014(pha)004:1120: gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i //
NK014(pha)004:1121: 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:1122: nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing //
NK014(pha)004:1123: 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che //
NK014(pha)004:1124: ma sring byams pa'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma //
NK014(pha)004:1125: ma sring mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:1127: ye nas gnyis med sogs kyis bzlas pa'i nyes byas su gyur pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1128: gsum pa rjes kyi cho ga la /
NK014(pha)004:1133: spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor dang lnga /
NK014(pha)004:1134: dang po tshogs mchod la'ang lnga las /
NK014(pha)004:1135: dang po bshams shing byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1136: dza gad m+aam sa gtso bor gyur pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bshams nas bsang chu gtor la /
NK014(pha)004:1137: ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa r+ais bsang /
NK014(pha)004:1138: ram yam kham gis bsregs gtor bkrus te stong par sbyangs /
NK014(pha)004:1140: zhal zas kyi snod du nyi ma la h'u s+w+aa
NK014(pha)004:1141: +aam h+aa las bza' btung gi dngos po ye shes
NK014(pha)004:1142: lnga'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi ro brgya pa 'dod yon
NK014(pha)004:1143: gyi rnam pa ma tshang ba med pa so so'i
NK014(pha)004:1144: lha mo'i rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
NK014(pha)004:1145: bcas pa'i sprin 'phro bar bsam la /
NK014(pha)004:1146: yi ge gsum lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK014(pha)004:1147: gnyis pa tshogs zhing spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1149: he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang //
NK014(pha)004:1150: dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas //
NK014(pha)004:1152: dur khrod mchod pa'i gnas 'di ru //
NK014(pha)004:1153: zhing chen gsar rnying stan du bting //
NK014(pha)004:1154: dmar gyi ar+g+ham rgya mtshor bskyil //
NK014(pha)004:1156: ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1158: e h+ye hi a na ya dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes pas spyan drangs la dgug gzhug bcing mnyes bya /
NK014(pha)004:1159: gsum pa mchod pa gsum las /
NK014(pha)004:1160: dang po spyir mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1162: bla med mchog gi mchod par sbyar ba 'di //
NK014(pha)004:1163: ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
NK014(pha)004:1164: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan te //
NK014(pha)004:1165: dam tshig gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1166: +aahmh'u su ra ta u pa b+h+yah ka ma la
NK014(pha)004:1167: m+aa la badz+ra a mri ta ha ra na pra
NK014(pha)004:1169: dzahmh'u bam hoh a la la hoh pa na pem pe nu su ra to /
NK014(pha)004:1171: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sid+d+hi hu /
NK014(pha)004:1172: sa ma yo ta muh sarba ma h+aa su kha sid+d+hi hu /
NK014(pha)004:1173: gnyis pa bye brag tu mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1174: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK014(pha)004:1178: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga l+aa s+ye h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1180: g+ai ti h+r+aih n+airti ah gsum pa khyad par gyi mchod pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1181: tshogs phud cha gsum mam bzhir spros te /
NK014(pha)004:1184: sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:1185: rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par ston pa dang //
NK014(pha)004:1186: snying rje rngams dang zhi ba la sogs pa //
NK014(pha)004:1187: sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin //
NK014(pha)004:1188: gar yang sgrub po rnal 'byor las //
NK014(pha)004:1189: gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che //
NK014(pha)004:1190: zla ba la sogs snying po can //
NK014(pha)004:1191: m+aam sa la sogs ro mchog gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1192: me tog sogs dang tsan+dana dri //
NK014(pha)004:1193: bzang dgu 'bul lo bzhes su gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1194: mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog /
NK014(pha)004:1195: byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa //
NK014(pha)004:1196: sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la //
NK014(pha)004:1197: h'u dang phata kyis ldan par mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:1198: dzahmh'u bam hoh sh+r+ai he ru ka ma h+aa badz+ra /
NK014(pha)004:1204: ba lim ta pra t+aits+tsha hoh sh+r+ai m+aan kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK014(pha)004:1205: zhes pas tshogs rdzas 'dod yon drug gi lha mo
NK014(pha)004:1206: mkha' khyab tu spros pas tshogs zhing rnams kyi gnas
NK014(pha)004:1207: drug tu thim pas dgyes par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:1210: tshe rabs thog ma med pa tshun chad nas //
NK014(pha)004:1211: da lha'i lus 'di blangs pa yan chad du //
NK014(pha)004:1212: lus kyi sdig byas spyod pa ngan du spyad //
NK014(pha)004:1213: ngag gi tshig 'khyal smra ba ngan du brjod //
NK014(pha)004:1214: sems kyi blo nor log par bsam pa sogs //
NK014(pha)004:1215: 'dod khro gti mug dbang gis nongs bgyis pa //
NK014(pha)004:1216: bkra ba'i lha tshogs khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1217: ye shes lha la rtog pa mi mnga' yang //
NK014(pha)004:1218: de yi 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha srin rnams //
NK014(pha)004:1219: mi yi skyon mthong tsam na bar chad rtsom //
NK014(pha)004:1220: nongs shing 'gal 'khrul ci mchis mthol zhing bshags //
NK014(pha)004:1221: mthol bshags bzhes nas tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1222: zhes dang yi ge brgya pa yang brjod cing /
NK014(pha)004:1223: tshogs rdzas bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du phul bas
NK014(pha)004:1224: thugs dam bskang zhing nyams chag dag par bsam mo
NK014(pha)004:1226: tshogs cha gsum pa'i 'dod yon gyi lha mo h'u zhes pas rang la bsdus nas /
NK014(pha)004:1228: h'u ha he phata b+h+yo ram /
NK014(pha)004:1229: snod bcud thams cad khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhengs par bsam la /
NK014(pha)004:1230: n+ri yam dzah n+ri badz+ra ang+ku sha dzah tri yam
NK014(pha)004:1231: dzah tri badz+ra ang+ku sha dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh sder
NK014(pha)004:1232: mo'i sngags mthar / bo d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+hi ku ru h'u h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1233: badz+ra kro d+ha phata dzah badz+ra sat+wa h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1237: ces tshe lung gi dgongs pas bsgral /
NK014(pha)004:1245: bee d+aur sngon po'i rin chen ri rab la //
NK014(pha)004:1246: nyi ma stong gi 'od zer gdal ba ltar //
NK014(pha)004:1247: sems dpa' sngon po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can //
NK014(pha)004:1248: dpal ldan gzi byin 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK014(pha)004:1249: 'od phung stug po sprin ltar 'khrigs pa yi //
NK014(pha)004:1250: 'jigs byed rngams stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
NK014(pha)004:1251: za byed bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste //
NK014(pha)004:1252: gdug pa thams cad rdo rje'i zhal du 'dren //
NK014(pha)004:1253: mi bzad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing //
NK014(pha)004:1254: khams gsum za bar chas pa'i rkan sgra can //
NK014(pha)004:1255: nyi zla rab tu 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis //
NK014(pha)004:1256: bdud dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK014(pha)004:1257: 'byung po'i sha ni zan las zhim //
NK014(pha)004:1258: gti mug mchod pa bla na med //
NK014(pha)004:1259: bla med mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK014(pha)004:1260: sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1261: 'byung po'i khrag ni chang las zhim //
NK014(pha)004:1262: 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med //
NK014(pha)004:1263: bla med mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK014(pha)004:1264: gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1265: 'byung po'i rus pa mar las zhim //
NK014(pha)004:1266: zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med //
NK014(pha)004:1267: bla med mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK014(pha)004:1268: thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1269: zhes dang rtsa sngags kyi mthar kh+aa hi btags pas 'bul zhing stob bo //
NK014(pha)004:1270: bzhi pa tshogs la rol pa ni /
NK014(pha)004:1271: las kyi rdo rjes 'khor lo 'dus pa'i gtso bo
NK014(pha)004:1272: la phyag byas thabs shes kyi rdzas bsnol mar 'bul
NK014(pha)004:1273: zhing / mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dpal //
NK014(pha)004:1274: log rtog mtshan ma'i spros pa ngang gis zhi //
NK014(pha)004:1275: dam tshig bzhin las ci bder spyad nas kyang //
NK014(pha)004:1276: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK014(pha)004:1278: des kyang pad+ma'i phyag rgya bskor zhing /
NK014(pha)004:1279: a la la hoh zhes len cing rnal 'byor pa
NK014(pha)004:1280: rnams lhar snang gi ngang nas nang gi sreg blugs
NK014(pha)004:1281: kyi tshul du tshim par rol zhing /
NK014(pha)004:1282: de'i mthar smon lam yang gdab bo //
NK014(pha)004:1283: lnga pa lhag ma'i cho ga la sngar zur du bcad pa'i phud dang me gtor bcas bshams la /
NK014(pha)004:1284: lhag ma'i dam tshig gsang ba'i 'dod yon bdud rtsi'i phung po zad mi shes par bsam la /
NK014(pha)004:1286: 'dod rgyal gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
NK014(pha)004:1293: to sha ya to sha ya /
NK014(pha)004:1296: sarba badz+ra d+aa ki n+ai n+aam /
NK014(pha)004:1297: hri da yam h'u dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh d+aa ki
NK014(pha)004:1298: h'u dzah zhes spyugs pa'i brda dang bcas te spyan
NK014(pha)004:1299: drangs pas / lhag ma'i mgron rnams bya khyung thang
NK014(pha)004:1300: la lhags pa bzhin skad cig gis byon par bsam
NK014(pha)004:1301: drangs pas / zhing / dza gad kyi kha phru mkha' dbyings kyi rgyas dme gtor du dbab cing /
NK014(pha)004:1302: gu ru kro d+ha rat+na sa ma ya p+r+ai sha
NK014(pha)004:1303: purba bud+d+ha k+she ta k+sho b+ha ka ra h'u phata
NK014(pha)004:1304: / ces pas byin gyis brlabs nas phud lhag bsres la /
NK014(pha)004:1305: he ru ka yi thod rgya bcas te /
NK014(pha)004:1306: badz+ra d+aa ki n+ai pra t+aits+tsha mam ba lim te h'u phata /
NK014(pha)004:1308: bud+d+ha d+aa ki n+ai nas phata /
NK014(pha)004:1309: rat+na d+aa ki n+ai nas t+r+aam phata /
NK014(pha)004:1310: pad+ma d+aa ki n+ai nas h+r+aihphata /
NK014(pha)004:1312: ces mchod cing sman raka sbreng ste /
NK014(pha)004:1313: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK014(pha)004:1314: lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin //
NK014(pha)004:1315: rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags pas //
NK014(pha)004:1316: gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo //
NK014(pha)004:1317: sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka /
NK014(pha)004:1318: shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can //
NK014(pha)004:1319: thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:1320: dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che //
NK014(pha)004:1321: lha chen la sogs dbang du bsdus //
NK014(pha)004:1322: 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas //
NK014(pha)004:1323: so so'i las rnams bskos pa de //
NK014(pha)004:1324: ji ltar dam bcas khas blangs pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:1325: ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung //
NK014(pha)004:1326: dam bcas bzhin du ma byas nas //
NK014(pha)004:1327: ji ltar dam bcas mna' bor ba'i //
NK014(pha)004:1329: dam tshig de las 'das gyur na //
NK014(pha)004:1330: mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun //
NK014(pha)004:1333: ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos //
NK014(pha)004:1334: las de mngon du ma byas na //
NK014(pha)004:1335: rang gis mna' bor khas blangs pas //
NK014(pha)004:1336: rul myag tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro //
NK014(pha)004:1337: rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:1338: las rnams yongs su bya ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:1339: 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyong //
NK014(pha)004:1340: phra men ma yang dngos grub thob //
NK014(pha)004:1341: bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos //
NK014(pha)004:1342: zhes brjod cing lhag gtor phyir dor nas /
NK014(pha)004:1343: ya hi gats+tshah zhes pas phyi rol 'khor gyi mgron rnams rang gnas su gshegs par bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:1344: gnyis pa brtan ma skyong ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:1345: phyi rol du brtan ma'i gtor ma sman phud kyis bran la /
NK014(pha)004:1349: gtor ma'i rdul phra rab re re zhing rin po
NK014(pha)004:1350: che'i gur khang longs spyod zad mi shes pas nam
NK014(pha)004:1354: tshogs dang bka' yi tshogs bcas nyid //
NK014(pha)004:1355: khrag 'thung de bzhin nam mkha'i sku //
NK014(pha)004:1356: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs skyong ma rnams //
NK014(pha)004:1357: 'dir byon dam skongs phrin las mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:1358: bdag nyid chen mo la sogs bdud mo bzhi //
NK014(pha)004:1359: gangs dkar sha med la sogs gnod sbyin bzhi //
NK014(pha)004:1360: kong btsun de mo la sogs sman mo bzhi //
NK014(pha)004:1361: bod khams skyong ba'i che zhe chen mo rnams //
NK014(pha)004:1362: bran g.yog mang po'i 'khor dang bcas //
NK014(pha)004:1363: lhab lhub mang po'i rgyan dang bcas //
NK014(pha)004:1364: sil snyan mang po'i sgra dang bcas //
NK014(pha)004:1365: 'dir byon dam skongs phrin las mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:1366: che zhe chen mo khyed rnams kyang //
NK014(pha)004:1367: a su ra yi brag phug tu //
NK014(pha)004:1369: rlangs chen dpal gyi seng ge yis //
NK014(pha)004:1370: zhing chen stan la bkod nas kyang //
NK014(pha)004:1371: lag tu rdo rje gtad nas ni //
NK014(pha)004:1372: dbang bskur gsang ba'i mtshan nas brjod //
NK014(pha)004:1373: rdo rje 'chang gi gral du bzhag /
NK014(pha)004:1374: bod khams bsrung zhing skyong ba dang //
NK014(pha)004:1375: rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs bya zhes //
NK014(pha)004:1376: ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:1377: g.yar dam gnyan po rjes dgongs la //
NK014(pha)004:1378: dam rdzas bka' yi gtor ma longs //
NK014(pha)004:1379: bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK014(pha)004:1385: ma ma sring 'gro ma h'u b+h+yo h'u h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1387: ma h+aa pany+tsa sogs kyis sman gtor rak+tasa kyang mchod cing sman raka sbreng /
NK014(pha)004:1389: ya hi gats+tshasa gshegs gsol byas la /
NK014(pha)004:1390: gtor ma gtsang sar bskyal lo //
NK014(pha)004:1391: gsum pa nyer bsdu bya ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:1392: thun mtshams la 'jug pa'am nyal ba na /
NK014(pha)004:1395: zhes pas dkyil 'khor gsal btab la /
NK014(pha)004:1396: skabs 'dir mchod bstod dang bzod gsol ni byas kyang chog la ma byas kyang mi 'gal lo //
NK014(pha)004:1397: de nas rtag mtha' bsal phyir /
NK014(pha)004:1399: rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis phog pas dag pa'i
NK014(pha)004:1400: snod bcud thams cad gzhal yas khang srung 'khor dang
NK014(pha)004:1402: gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad yab rnams la thim /
NK014(pha)004:1403: dngos po thams cad yum rnams la thim /
NK014(pha)004:1404: 'khor rnams phyi nas rim bzhin gtso bo yab yum la thim /
NK014(pha)004:1406: de ye shes sems dpa' la thim /
NK014(pha)004:1407: de ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la thim /
NK014(pha)004:1409: h'u gyen rdzogs n+aa da'i bar du bsdus nas mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings su bstim mo //
NK014(pha)004:1410: chad pa'i mtha' bsal ba'i phyir /
NK014(pha)004:1411: nyal ba las langs pa'am spyod lam la 'jug pa na /
NK014(pha)004:1412: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK014(pha)004:1414: dpal chen po he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK014(pha)004:1415: pa snang stong sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i skur ldang ngo
NK014(pha)004:1416: // bzhi pa go cha bgo zhing lus bsrung ba ni /
NK014(pha)004:1418: mgrin par +aah snying gar h'u yig rnams kyis mtshan par bsam zhing /
NK014(pha)004:1419: badz+ra k+aa w+aa tsi rak+sha ham /
NK014(pha)004:1420: zhes brjod pas lus thams cad rdo rje'i go chas bcings te cis kyang mi shigs par bltas la /
NK014(pha)004:1421: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
NK014(pha)004:1422: sku gsung thugs kyis kun la khyab //
NK014(pha)004:1423: ces brjod cing nga rgyal bya /
NK014(pha)004:1424: de nas mdzub mo g.yas g.yon gnyis su dang t+r+aum
NK014(pha)004:1425: las rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mi 'chi thabs sbyor
NK014(pha)004:1426: bskyed la / lte ba snying ga ltag pa dang /
NK014(pha)004:1427: dpral ba spyi bo gnas lnga dug /
NK014(pha)004:1429: zhes brjod bzhin par mdzub mo gnyis bsnol te rim par reg pas /
NK014(pha)004:1430: khro bo gnyis dang rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud kyis bsrung zhing brtan par bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1431: de nas thod pa'i phyag rgya mgo bo'i gnas lngar bzhag la /
NK014(pha)004:1432: badz+ra ka p+aa la a b+hi shiny+tsa tram tram /
NK014(pha)004:1433: zhes thod pa'i khang bu rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar mos /
NK014(pha)004:1434: dar dpyangs kyi phyag rgya bcas la /
NK014(pha)004:1435: +amo +aar+ya lam+b+ho d+ha ra a b+hi shiny+tsa h+r+aihh+r+aih zhes
NK014(pha)004:1436: pas cod pan mthing ga g.yas su 'phyang zhing dmar
NK014(pha)004:1437: po g.yon du 'phur bar bsam mo //
NK014(pha)004:1438: gu h+ya sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK014(pha)004:1440: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum la sogs par bzlas pas shin tu brtan par byas la /
NK014(pha)004:1441: dge ba bsngo zhing bkra shis brjod pa rnams kyis mtha' rgyas par bya'o //
NK014(pha)004:1442: lnga pa spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor ni /
NK014(pha)004:1443: snang spyod thams cad rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i
NK014(pha)004:1444: dkyil 'khor du shes shing za nyal 'gro 'chags kyi
NK014(pha)004:1445: spyod lam thams cad thabs shes kyi rnal 'byor khyad
NK014(pha)004:1446: par can gyis zin pa'i sgo nas don yod pa
NK014(pha)004:1448: de ltar he ru ka dpal sgrub pa'i thabs //
NK014(pha)004:1449: gter chen bla ma'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i bcud //
NK014(pha)004:1450: bsnyen pa'i las byang nyung ngur dril ba 'di //
NK014(pha)004:1451: dang po'i las can rnams la phan phyir bris //
NK014(pha)004:1452: gzu lum ras chod nyes pa mchis na bshags //
NK014(pha)004:1453: legs par bshad pa'i cha shas gang yod pa'i //
NK014(pha)004:1454: dge des lan 'dir slob pa'i gang zag rnams //
NK014(pha)004:1455: zung 'jug chen po'i go 'phang mngon byed shog /
NK014(pha)004:1456: ces sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba he ru ka'i sgrub thabs
NK014(pha)004:1457: gter chen chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung las bsnyen pa'i
NK014(pha)004:1458: las byang nyung ngur bsdus te /
NK014(pha)004:1459: rang dang skal mnyam rnams la phan pa'i blos rig
NK014(pha)004:1460: 'dzin gyi btsun pa pad+ma badz+rasa g.yi stod dben pa'i
NK014(pha)004:1461: nags tshal d+r+wa ba can du bris pa gsang chen
